title: Golden Opportunity - 51.5p Commercial Property
details:
The Golden Opportunity for Lucky Person .................. Don't miss this opportunity .........
Land extent 51.5 perches
Facing Ward Place and Kynesy Road,
More than 15000 sqf Upstairs Building
Ample car parking
Ideal for Show room/ Apartment Complex / Office complex/ or any business purpose
Expecting price Rs. 950,000,000/=
Offers welcome
